TEXT_SEARCH_SECTION.TITLE: Text search
TEXT_SEARCH_SECTION.TEXT: A free text search query without any operator, such as volvo for sale will match any documents that contains any of the words in any of the fields independently of their order. If surrounding the query with double quotes, e.g. "volvo for sale" it will search for all of the words in that order. It is also possible to specify words that must (+) and must not (-) be present. For example, apple +iPhone -7s finds any items where iPhone must be present, 7s must not be present and where apple is optional.

SEARCH_ON_SPECIFIC_FIELDS_SECTION.TITLE: Search on specific fields
SEARCH_ON_SPECIFIC_FIELDS_SECTION.TEXT: Besides, you can also specify what fields the query should match against:
SEARCH_ON_SPECIFIC_FIELDS_SECTION.LINE1: Search for items that contain lamp in the title: document.content.title:lamp
SEARCH_ON_SPECIFIC_FIELDS_SECTION.LINE2: Search for the exact phrase MacBook Pro in the body: document.content.body:"MacBook Pro".
SEARCH_ON_SPECIFIC_FIELDS_SECTION.LINE3: Search with the * wildcard to replace 0+ characters: document.content.category.name:Cars*.

RANGE_SEARCH_SECTION.TITLE: Range search
RANGE_SEARCH_SECTION.TEXT: For date, numeric and string fields, it is also possible to specify a range. Inclusive ranges are specified with square brackets [min TO max] and exclusive ranges with curly brackets {min TO max}. One sided ranges can be specified with >, >=,<, and <=:
RANGE_SEARCH_SECTION.LINE1: Search for items that have a price between 3 to 10: document.content.price.amount:[3 TO 10]
RANGE_SEARCH_SECTION.LINE2: Search for items that have a price less than or equal to 50: document.content.price.amount:<=50

LOGICAL_OPERATORS_SECTION.TITLE: OR/AND Logical Operators
LOGICAL_OPERATORS_SECTION.TEXT: Finally, it is also possible to group multiple words, operators and clauses to form sub queries:
LOGICAL_OPERATORS_SECTION.LINE1: Search for items that contain the words dangerous and phone in the body, the words volvo or sell in the title and where the category begins with Kl: document.content.body:(dangerous AND phone) OR document.content.title:(volvo sell) AND document.content.category.name:Kl*

MORE_HELP_SECTION.TITLE: More help
MORE_HELP_SECTION.TEXT: More information and examples are available in the Knowledge Base

QUEUE_LIST_PAGE_FOOTER.MODERATION_QUEUES_INFO:
Queues are where items await for manual review. 
From this screen, you can check at a glance which queues need the most attention. Pick a queue and start moderating!
Queues can be worked on by moderators in parallel: each moderator will get to work on its own items.
QUEUE_LIST_PAGE_FOOTER.DIFFERENT_QUEUES_INFO:
Use automation rules to route items to a specific queue, based on criteria such as the language, price or category of an item, or the geolocation of end users.
Moderators can also route items to a different queue, to have someone else look into an item.

RIGHT_TO_BE_FORGOTTEN.TITLE: Right to be forgotten
RIGHT_TO_BE_FORGOTTEN.TEXT1:
You can delete all items tied to a specific user ID. This can be used for handling "right to be forgotten" requests coming from your end users.

Upon confirmation, all items ever sent to Implio for moderation (either via API or CSV importer) and tied to the specified user ID will be deleted permanently.

WILL_BE_DELETED.TEXT1: All items tied to the specified user ID and previously sent to Implio for moderation (via API or CSV importer)

WILL_NOT_BE_DELETED.TEXT1: Items tied to other user IDs

RIGHT_TO_BE_FORGOTTEN.DELETE_USER_DATA_SUCCESS: Data deletion has been successfully scheduled
RIGHT_TO_BE_FORGOTTEN.FAILED_TO_FIND_USER_TEXT: Failed to search for the user. Please try again

DELETE_USER_DATA_MODAL.TITLE: Delete items for user ID {USER_ID}
DELETE_USER_DATA_MODAL.TEXT1: You are about to permanently delete {COUNT, plural, =1{1 item} other{{COUNT} items}} with a user ID of {USER_ID}. Please note that this operation may take a few hours to complete.
DELETE_USER_DATA_MODAL.TEXT2: Are you sure you want to proceed?
DELETE_USER_DATA_MODAL.USER_HAS_NO_DATA_TEXT: The user {USER_ID} has 0 item in Implio.

DELETE_ALL_CONTENT.TEXT1:
You can permanently delete all content that has ever been sent to this Implio team for moderation, either via API or CSV importer.

Upon confirmation, it will take 48 hours for all content to be irreversibly deleted from this team. Until then, any administrator of this team (including yourself) can still cancel the operation from this page.
DELETE_ALL_CONTENT.DELETION_SCHEDULED_TEXT:
At {TIME}, {USER_NAME} ({EMAIL}) requested the deletion of all items ever sent to this team for moderation.

All administrators of this team have been notified by email.

The data will be irreversibly deleted from our servers in {REMAINING_TIME}. You or any administrator of this team can still cancel this operation before {DEADLINE}.

MODAL.TITLE: Delete all content
MODAL.TEXT1:
You are about to delete all items from this team. All items ever sent to this Implio team for moderation will be permanently deleted.

Upon confirmation, you have 48 hours to cancel this operation, after which all content will be deleted irreversibly. An email will be sent to all administrators of this team.
MODAL.TEXT2: all items in this team will be irreversibly deleted
MODAL.TEXT3: items that are still awaiting moderation will also be deleted
MODAL.TEXT4: I have 48 hours to cancel this operation

NOTICE.WARNING_TEXT: Warning: all items in this team are about to be permanently deleted.
NOTICE.TEXT_FOR_ADMIN: You still have {REMAINING_TIME} to cancel this operation.

WILL_BE_DELETED.TEXT1: All items ever sent to this team, either via API or CSV importer

DATA_RETENTION_POLICY.TITLE: Data retention policy
DATA_RETENTION_POLICY.TEXT1: You can choose to store items sent to your Implio team for moderation (either via API or CSV importer) for a limited time only.
DATA_RETENTION_POLICY.TEXT2: By default, all items are automatically deleted after 24 months. You can change the retention period using the options below.

WILL_BE_DELETED.TEXT: All items ever sent to this team, either via API or CSV importer

DATA_RETENTION_POLICY.UPDATE_SUCCESS: Data retention policy is successfully updated!
DATA_RETENTION_POLICY.UPDATE_FAILURE: Failed to update data retention policy

CSV_IMPORTER.TITLE: Import your sample data from CSV file

UPLOAD_FILE.DRAG_DROP_TEXT: Drag and Drop a CSV file here
UPLOAD_FILE.SELECT_FILE_BTN: Or select a file to upload
UPLOAD_FILE.FORMAT_CSV_FILE_MODAL_TEXT1: Use column titles in your CSV file to simplify attribute mapping
UPLOAD_FILE.FORMAT_CSV_FILE_MODAL_TEXT2: Reuse Implio's attributes as titles of column in the CSV file to automate attribute mapping
UPLOAD_FILE.FORMAT_CSV_FILE_MODAL_TEXT3:
Provide category:id together with category:name in separate columns
Provide type:id together with type:name in separate columns
UPLOAD_FILE.FORMAT_CSV_FILE_MODAL_TEXT4: Use prices without commas (Ex: 235.99 not 235,99 ), price must be accompanied by currency code in ISO 4217 format (Ex: USD or EUR )
UPLOAD_FILE.FORMAT_CSV_FILE_MODAL_TEXT5: Country code must be in ISO 3166 format (Ex: US or FR )
UPLOAD_FILE.FORMAT_CSV_FILE_MODAL_TEXT6: Multiple image URLs, email addresses or phone numbers can be inserted at once by putting them in the same cell separated by commas(Ex: "olivier@besedo.com, ada@besedo.com")
UPLOAD_FILE.EXPORT_CSV_TO_EXCEL_LINK: How to export CSV from Excel
UPLOAD_FILE.WARNING1: Error! You can only upload one file at one time
UPLOAD_FILE.WARNING2: Error! You can only upload a CSV file
UPLOAD_FILE.WARNING3: Error! Your CSV file is wrong
UPLOAD_FILE.WARNING4: Error! Your CSV file is empty
UPLOAD_FILE.WARNING5: Error! Your CSV file needs to have at least 3 columns
UPLOAD_FILE.WARNING6: Error! Your CSV file has duplicate columns
UPLOAD_FILE.BIG_FILE_TEXT: The maximum number of documents was exceeded! Only the first {limitDocLength} documents will be imported. Please re-upload the remaining documents in batches of {limitDocLength} or less.

MAP_COLUMNS.ATTRIBUTE_ICON_TOOLTIP: The colon in the name of attribute represents level of data, learn more from the following link.
MAP_COLUMNS.CUSTOMER_SPECIFIC_ICON_TOOLTIP: If you want to input some general customer specific attribute, please enter text starting with a letter. Subsequent characters can be letters but also be digits (0-9). Keys are case sensitive. If you want to input customer specific attribute under User, Location or Content section, please separate the level name and the attribute value with colon. The field can not be empty. E.g. "user:information"
MAP_COLUMNS.WARNING3: Customer Specific Attribute can not be empty
MAP_COLUMNS.WARNING5: Attribute name is wrong, please check the reference
